via.name: cookie
via.title: cookie accepts cookie name, path, and domain with out of bounds characters

via.name: esbuild
via.title: esbuild enables any website to send any requests to the development server and read the response

via.name: tar-fs
via.title: tar-fs Vulnerable to Link Following and Path Traversal via Extracting a Crafted tar File

via.name: tar-fs
via.title: tar-fs can extract outside the specified dir with a specific tarball

via.name: tmp
via.title: tmp allows arbitrary temporary file / directory write via symbolic link `dir` parameter

via.name: ws
via.title: ws affected by a DoS when handling a request with many HTTP headers

findings.recommendation: Use environment variables for connection strings

recommendations: Remove hardcoded secrets and use environment variables
Implement proper secrets management (e.g., Azure Key Vault, AWS Secrets Manager)
Add secrets scanning to pre-commit hooks

violations.recommendation: Create proper ignore files to prevent sensitive data exposure
